message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $1200000. Considering its unparalleled quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I propose to sell the product to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This exceptional opportunity allows you to secure this valuable asset at a significant discount. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
